title: PATT Standard T&S Grant 2011-12 for Dr D A Green
abstractText: The observations planned are Proposal 21_025 "The radio spectral properties of the sub-mm population at 15.7 GHz".
impactText:
This &quot;grant&quot; was for an oberving trip to the GMRT.
These formed part of a PhD. Other
findingsText:
Made deep radio observations with GMRT (as part
of PhD research project). Help understanding of faint, distant radio sources in the Universe. Other
